LanguageData.WAW.occupyChance.Desc: chance for warbands to occupy a settlement
LanguageData.WAW.establishFeeMultiplier.Desc: you will need a cost {0} times as combat power of the warband to eastablish it.
LanguageData.WAW.enableFactionDefeat.Desc: whether or not factions should be defeated depending on events of this mod.
LanguageData.WAW.Welcome.Desc: Thank you for playing this mod, for more information please refer to workshop page.
LanguageData.factionLosing: This faction is losing the war, sooner or later they will collpase.
LanguageData.factionStrikeToSurvive: This faction barely stands, they have suffered from continues military failures.
LanguageData.factionWillingToFight: This faction suffered some losses, but they are willing to fight.
LanguageData.factionHungerForWar: This faction beleives they are the winning side.
LanguageData.WAW.ResettleWarband.Desc: Move warband On another tile, it will cost $10 per tile and person.
LanguageData.WAW.OrderAttack.Desc: Order warband to attack hostile settlemnt, or another warband.
LanguageData.WAW.DefeatWarbandLetter.Label: hostile warband defeated
LanguageData.WAW.DefeatWarbandLetter.Desc: We defeated a hostile warband! It's not a noticeable achievement, but another malicious attempt of {0} has been stopped.
LanguageData.WAW.InvalidObject: we are not attacking this one, sorry.
LanguageData.WAW.FarObject: we cannot reach that far, sir, ten tiles for the most.
LanguageData.WAW.FoundZeroPawns: Found zero combat pawns on this tech level.
LanguageData.WAW.WarbandWithdraw.Desc: Return all loots with drop pods
LanguageData.WAW.InSilvers: send in the form of silvers
LanguageData.WAW.ConfirmDestroyWarBand: Are you sure you want to remove this warband?
LanguageData.WAW.PlaceLootBox.Desc: place a loot box on disired location
LanguageData.WAW.warbandRaidCooldown.Desc: How many days before next player raid
LanguageData.WAW.WaitForCooldown: Sorry, we won't be avialable in next {0} days.
LanguageData.WAW.WarbandLoss: This warband has permanently lost a member, recruit new from recruiting window.
LanguageData.WAW.LostWarband.Desc: Everyone is dead, the entire warband is destroyed.
LanguageData.WAW.NoCustomPawnKinds: There's no custom pawnkinds, please create new.
